title: Stilton, Shropshire Blue and gorgonzola pan bagnat with watercress and rocket pesto
description: Use up leftovers from your cheese board with this simple recipe. You can easily swap the blue cheeses used here for your own favourites.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 cob loaf, or similar round rustic loaf
150g/5oz gorgonzola (or a similar vegetarian blue cheese), thickly sliced
